mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id,sk.user_phone,sk.create_time,sk.state, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id",s.name "seckill.name", s.start_time "seckill.start_time",s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} and sk.user_phone=#{userPhone};
